campaign.description: Every September, the Relay FM community of podcasters and listeners rallies together to support the lifesaving mission of St. Jude Childrenâ€™s Research Hospital during Childhood Cancer Awareness Month. Throughout the month, Relay FM will introduce ways to support St. Jude through entertaining donation challenges and other mini-fundraising events that will culminate in the second annual Relay for St. Jude Podcastathon on September 17th beginning at 12pm Eastern at twitch.tv/relayfm.
